text: "Zoom" is a 1982 song by American band Fat Larry's Band and released as the fourth single by their breakout album Breakin' Out. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in New Zealand, number 10 in Australia and fared poorly in the United States. Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:R&B; ballads
title: Zoom (Fat Larry's Band song)
